name: Achievement
description: Achievements are earnt by users and have various requirements.

name: AchievementEarning
description: An AchievementEarning represents a user's progress towards an achievement.

name: Announcement
description: Announcements are triggered by Mixer staff and inform users of important information and news on Mixer.

name: Broadcast
description: A broadcast represents a single broadcast from a Channel.

name: CPMAnalytic
description: A metric showing the impressions and payout for a period.

name: Channel
description: A single channel within Mixer. Each channel is owned by a user, and a channel can be broadcasted to.

name: ChannelAdvanced
description: Augmented regular channel with additional data.

name: ChannelAnalytic
description: A base analytics type for channel based analytical metrics.

name: ChannelFeatures
description: A list of channel features.

name: ChannelPreferences
description: Channel preferences are a list of options and attributes which control behaviour for the channel. Please see each property for more details.

name: ChannelSuggestions
description: Suggested channels with their beacon URLs

name: ChatEventRequest
description: Data required to create a Chat event.

name: ChatUser
description: Represents a user within chat for a channel and provides details about their status within the channel.

name: CheckoutItem
description: One item within an user's Order.

name: ClipError
description: Error information for an unsuccesful clip request

name: ClipMetadata
description: Metadata about a clip which can be updated

name: ClipProperties
description: Information about a clip.

name: ClipRequest
description: Information required to create a clip.

name: Confetti
description: Represents a confetti cannon configuration. Each channel can have is own customized confetti. The confetti cannon is triggered on subscription or direct purchase events on a channel.

name: ConfettiCircle
description: A definition for a circle within a Confetti configuration.

name: ConfettiImage
description: A definition for an image within a Confetti configuration.

name: ConfettiRectangle
description: A definition for a rectangle within a Confetti configuration.

name: Costream
description: A co-stream is a set of channels grouped together and displayed on Mixer together.

name: DelveBackground
description: Dictates what background to display on the homepage.

name: DelveCarousel
description: A large carousel for display on the homepage.

name: DelveChannels
description: A list of channel on Mixer.

name: DelveError
description: Returned when we tried to get some contents for this row, but encountered an error doing so.

name: DelveGames
description: A list of games streamed on Mixer.

name: DelveMixPlayFilters
description: Dictates the MixPlay games which are filterable on the browse page.

name: DelveOnlyOnMixer
description: Returned when we tried to get some contents for this row, but encountered an error doing so.

name: DiscordBot
description: Lists the configuration for this Discord bot.

name: DiscordChannel
description: Represents a single channel within a Discord server.

name: DiscordRole
description: Represents a role within a Discord server.

name: EmojiRankAnalytic
description: A channel metric showing how many times an emoji was used in a period.

name: EmoticonGroup
description: A list of emoticons and their coordinates within an EmoticonPack.

name: EmoticonPack
description: An emoticon pack is a list of emoticons that belong to a channel.

name: ExpandedChannel
description: Augmented ChannelAdvanced with additional properties.

name: ExpandedRedeemable
description: Augmented Redeemable with additional properties

name: ExpandedShare
description: Augmented share with additional properties.

name: ExpandedTranscodingProfile
description: Augments a regular transcoding profile by listing the transcodes available on this profile.

name: FTLVideoManifest
description: Provides details and information about an FTL Broadcast.

name: Follow
description: Represents a follow relationship between a user and a channel.

name: FollowersAnalytic
description: A channel metric showing how many followers the channel had at this time and the change in that metric.

name: FrontendVersion
description: Describes an available FrontendVersion. Users can sometime swap between frontend versions to test out new features on Mixer.

name: GameRankAnalytic
description: A channel metric showing details about the type this channel is broadcasting.

name: GameType
description: A GameType can be set on a channel and represents the title they are broadcasting.

name: GameTypeLookup
description: The result from looking up a game type.

name: GameTypeSimple
description: Base game type.

name: HostingSession
description: Base game type.

name: Ingest
description: An ingest definition. Ingests are used by streaming software to send video to Mixer.

name: IngestStreamAnalytic
description: A metric providing video details about a broadcast.

name: InteractiveAnalytic
description: A channel metric showing details about the type this channel is broadcasting.

name: InteractiveConnectionInfo
description: Provides connection details that can be used to connect to an interactive session on a channel.

name: InteractiveControls
description: Specifies the Interactive V1 Controls that an InteractiveVersion has.

name: InteractiveGame
description: An InteractiveGame is owned by a Channel and provides details about an Interactive experience or game on Mixer.

name: InteractiveGameListing
description: An interactive game within a list of Interactive games. Contains additional properties to avoid extra requests.

name: InteractiveJoyStickAnalysis
description: Analysis settings for a Joystick. If an analysis type is enabled results will be generated and sent to the Interactive Robot.

name: InteractiveMetric
description: An interactive metric represents a record for every time a channel enables interactive for any period of time

name: InteractiveScreenAnalysis
description: Analysis settings for a Screen control. If an analysis type is enabled results will be generated and sent to the Interactive Robot.

name: InteractiveTactileAnalysis
description: Analysis settings for a Tactile control. If an analysis type is enabled results will be generated and sent to the Interactive Robot.

name: InteractiveVersion
description: A versioned instance of an InteractiveGame.

name: InteractiveVersionExpanded
description: A versioned instance of an InteractiveGame.

name: InteractiveViewerAnalytic
description: A channel metric showing details about a participant in the Interactive game.

name: Invoice
description: A user invoice.

name: InvoiceItem
description: An item on a user's invoice.

name: IsoDate
description: An ISO8601 date string.

name: Language
description: An object representing a language.

name: LanguageCount
description: An object describing a count for a language.

name: LightVideoManifest
description: Describes a broadcast using the Light manifest structure.

name: LocaleAndString
description: An object representing a language specific string.

name: Locator
description: Information required to find a clip.

name: Notification
description: A single notification addressed to a user.

name: NotificationPreference
description: A user's notification preferences.

name: OAuthAuthorization
description: An OAuthClient which has been authorized by the user.

name: OAuthClient
description: An OAuthClient is an application or tool created by a developer. They can be used to ask for access to a user's account.

name: OAuthLink
description: Represents a linked account on another non-mixer service that this user has linked to their account.

name: PartnershipApp
description: Contains details about a particular partnership application.

name: PartnershipCriterion
description: A criterion that a channel must meet in order to apply for partnership.

name: PartnershipCriterionResult
description: The result of evaluating a partnership criterion.

name: PartnershipEvaluationResult
description: The result of evaluating whether or not a channel is eligible for partnership.

name: PartnershipExemption
description:
An exemption that allows a specific channel to bypass the minimum requirements
check for partnership.

name: PartyChatCreate
description: Sent in the request to create a new party chat channel.

name: PartyChatLatencyRecord
description: Results of a latency measurement to a server.

name: PartyChatMemberRef
description: Reference one user session in a party chat.

name: PartyChatServer
description: A server used to measure location-based latency in party chat.

name: PartyChatSession
description: A Party Chat voice session.

name: PartyChatSubscription
description: Provided to the Mixer server, then MPSD, when the client sets up an RTA subscription. See the Book of Party Chat / MPSD reference for more information about this, and how to use it.

name: PlayerLayout
description: The PlayerLayout configures the arrangement and positioning of the channels within a costream or hosting session.

name: PrivatePopulatedUser
description: A fully populater user with channel, preferences, groups and private details.

name: PrivateUser
description: A fully populater user with channel, preferences, groups and private details.

name: ProgressionActiveStorageProject
description: A type that contains information about progression storage that has been loaded into a channel.

name: ProgressionActiveStorageProjectList
description: A type that contains a page of results from an active progression project query.

name: ProgressionAppAccess
description: A type that contains key value pairs where the key is an app or game reference and the value is its permissions to a progression project.

name: ProgressionChannelViewerStorageLoadResult
description: A type that contains information about an operation to run against a player or channel viewers.

name: ProgressionEvent
description: A type that contains information about a notification event to be sent for progression storage changes.

name: ProgressionEventList
description: A type that contains a page of results from a progression project events query.

name: ProgressionGameAccess
description: Available rights in comma delimited string:

name: ProgressionLocalizedNotification
description: A type that contains information about an operation to run against a player or channel viewers.

name: ProgressionOperation
description: A type that contains information about an operation to run against a player or channel viewers.

name: ProgressionOperationError
description: A type that contains information a viewer session and failed operation.

name: ProgressionOperationErrors
description: A type that contains information about failures in a partial success operation.

name: ProgressionOperationType
description: Available operations are:

name: ProgressionOperations
description: A type that contains information about progression operations to run against a player or channel viewers.

name: ProgressionPlayerStorage
description: A type that contains information about progression storage for a player.

name: ProgressionPlayerStorageList
description: A type that contains a page of results from an progression storage query.

name: ProgressionProject
description: A type that contains information about progression storage across users for a specific game.

name: ProgressionProjectList
description: A type that contains a page of results from a progression project query.

name: ProgressionStatistic
description: A type that contains information about a single value in progression storage.

name: ProgressionViewerStatisticValue
description: A type that contains information about a single value in progression storage.

name: ProgressionViewerStorageLoadResult
description: A type that contains information about a single value in progression storage.

name: ProgressionViewersStatisticValues
description: A type that contains information about a single value in progression storage.

name: Recording
description: Details about a recorded Broadcast from a channel.

name: RecurringPayment
description: A recurring payment is a payment which will continue to be charged to the user every period until it is canceled. These are used for subscriptions and Mixer Pro.

name: RecurringPaymentExpanded
description: An augmented recurring payment with additional details, used in Details views. Provides nested objects such as the owner of the RecurringPayment.

name: Redeemable
description: A redeemable is an item granted to a user that can be exchanged for an item or activity. These are currently only used for Mixer Pro membership and channel subscriptions.

name: RedeemablePartner
description: Extra information added to a redeemable when it is a Partner's monthly subscription / Pro codes.

name: Resource
description: Resources are general use items that are stored and linked to other entities within Mixer.They usually represent images or backgrounds for a channel or user.

name: Role
description: Available roles are:

name: SemVer
description: A semantic version number.

name: Session
description: Provides details about a Mixer user's session.

name: Share
description: A share allows a user to share an entity with another user. Currently this is only used for InteractiveGames.

name: SocialInfo
description: The social information for a channel.

name: StreamHostsAnalytic
description: Metric showing when a channel is hosted.

name: StreamSessionsAnalytic
description: Metric showing a channel going online or offline.

name: StreamViewer
description: A stream viewer represents a record for every time a viewer watches a stream for any period of time

name: SubRevenueAnalytic
description: A channel metric that shows when a channel's subscription revenue changes.

name: Subscription
description: A subscription lists details about a user's subscription to a resource.

name: SubscriptionExpanded
description: The subscription belonging to this payment.

name: SubscriptionPlan
description: Details on a subscription plan

name: SubscriptionWithGroup
description: A subscription with added group information as a nested object.

name: SubscriptionsAnalytic
description: A channel metric that shows when a subscription was made to a channel.

name: Team
description: A team is a group of users.

name: TeamMembership
description: Provides details about the membership of a user to a team.

name: TeamMembershipExpanded
description: A team membership expanded with additional properties including nested relations.

name: TestStreamSetting
description: Lists the test stream settings for a Channel.

name: TimeStamped
description: A type that contains information about creation, update and deletion dates.

name: TranscodingProfile
description: A transcoding profile controls the transcoding options for a channel.

name: TranscodingProfileTranscode
description: Represents a single transcode option for a channel.

name: TypeInformation
description: Describes a type stored in the Mixer backend.

name: TypeTitle
description: Describes a title associated with a type.

name: UUID
description: A universally unique identifier (UUID).

name: UnixTimestampMillis
description: A unix timestamp with milliseconds.

name: User
description: A user is a person on Mixer; they can sign in and interact with the site. Each user owns a channel, which they can broadcast to.

name: UserGroup
description: A Group which a user can belong to can control features or access controls throughout Mixer.

name: UserInteractiveMetric
description: A user interactive metric represents a record for every time a user views an channel with interactive running for any period of time

name: UserLog
description: A UserLog entry lists events and changes made to a user.

name: UserPreferences
description: Object containing user preferences.

name: UserWithChannel
description: A User object with an embedded Channel.

name: UserWithGroups
description: A User object with an embedded array of groups they belong to.

name: VOD
description: A VOD is a recorded broadcast which can be watched again on Mixer.

name: VideoManifestResolution
description: A resoloution available for a video manifest.

name: VideoSettings
description: Video settings linked to a user's channel

name: ViewerAnalytic
description: A channel metric, which contains the number of anonymous and authenticated Mixer users at a point in time.

name: ViewerCount
description: A channel metric showing how many viewers and of what type were watching the channel at a set point in time.

name: ViewerMetricAnalytic
description: A channel metric showing details about a viewer on a channel.

name: ViewerSessionCountAnalytic
description: A metric showing the number of viewers in a period on a channel.

name: Webhook
description: A registered webhook. For more information about webhooks, see aka.ms/mixrpokr.

name: XblFriendsResponse
description: Response data for call to get Xbox Live friends
